11213221.content:
The ecstasy created by your fantasy coming true was beginning to wear off. Reality settled into its place, prompting you to realize the situation you were in. You were under the complete control and domination of your cousin Dallas. You began to think she had no intentions of growing you back. Trying to make the best of the situation, you lean up and lick the toe in front of you.

It flinches, startled by your willing cooperation. It settles back on top of you, and you continue to lick. You can hear your cousin sigh in relief. You take this as a sign that she’s pleased with you. You lick around her toe, eventually making your way to the crevasse between her big and second toe. You use your hand to push away some sock lint from between her toes, and you start to lick. You almost barf at the taste, but stop yourself.

Your body struggled to take in all the stimuli. On the one hand, you were living your dream you were getting up close and personal with the foot of your giant younger cousin. Excitement coursed through your body as you engulfed yourself in her sole. But on the other hand, you were overwhelmed by a strong sense of fear. You struggled with the thought of dying here, or spending the rest of your life as Dallas’s foot licker. The thought excited you and scared you half to death at the same time. You wanted to smile and yell for joy, but you also wanted to cry and scream for a way out.

You feel the shoe being tilted down. You fall down to the front of the shoe, not too far from where you were a moment ago. All five of Dallas’s massive digits are raised above you. You wait for them to return in anticipation, but wish they hadn’t when they did. You get grabbed by the digits. You’re squeezed. Her toes drilled into your back, forcing you into the ball of your foot.

“Lick, remember?” You heard a soft whisper.

You fought back tears, shaking your head. You hesitantly dragged your tongue against the rough skin. Her ball was a lot harder than her soft toes. You felt like you were going to pop. You were scared, but your excited side soon began to take over.

Overwhelmed by all the sensory information, your body reverts back into the boy who loved his situation. You kiss her foot, grateful that Dallas chose to put you here. You take in a deep breath. The smell is intensive, but oddly a wonderful essence. You lick up the jam you found just above your head. You swallow it without question. It was Dallas’s foot jam, after all.

You’re taken out of your trance as you feel your world begin to shift.
